title: 审计机枪池合约（audit the YFII Vault contracts）
body:
[**知道创宇**](https://www.knownsec.com/) 提供了报价，价格是**11.2万RMB**，届时通过YFII开发者基金来进行支付。机枪池策略合约共有16个，审计通过后，可为交易所，资管等大规模资金进驻提供便利。

[**Knowsec**](https://www.knownsec.com/) ( a top tier audit company ) provided a quotation, the audit price is **16115 USD**, and the payment will be made through the YFII Developer Fund. There are a total of 16 vault and strategic contracts, which can facilitate the entry of large-scale funds such as exchanges and asset management.
author: 0xe2ca7390e76c5A992749bB622087310d2e63ca29
